GSD.product_version: versions from v5.9 to before v5.15.46
GSD.description:
media: i2c: max9286: fix kernel oops when removing module

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.46 by commit a4ec75df70575cdf33d9638c7844e729bfe6ce24, it was introduced in version v5.9 by commit 66d8c9d2422da21ed41f75c03ba0685987b65fe0. For more details please see the references link.
